topic.title: Looking to create a consensus making system for a Post-Capitalist Economy.
topic.body:
I have thought this for almost a year; I think that ZeroNet can be used to create a decentralized alternative society where we can get rid of injustice and suffering that we are causing to our environment and to us.

I am trying to take advantage of the collaborative way of creating online documents like we know from Wikipedia to construct the reference document for the new social system that would contain the moral principles, the problems and the solutions we would have agreed collectively.

I thought the process might follow a workflow that serves as a guide to complete every single step of the consensus decision-making.

I am doing it in that way because I want the process to be easy to follow, to be collaborative, and to make the consensus easy to reach on every step.

The problem is that I don't want to be the one who controls all the process since I want this new society to be an agreement between everyone who is interested on it. I have seen some sites on clearnet like: Loomio.com and Kialo.com for getting examples of decision making systems, but the problem is that I think the consensus feature is a critical one and I am really stuck at this point. So my question is:

How could we have a consensus agreement system? How do you imagine it?

Thanks in advance, community.

Sorry for the grammar, I don't speak english.

1_1AhXDbKvcLap7TcS2542J7bFYzKHM3xeRU.body:
I want to add one question to this discussion, sorry if my english is broken but I thought It is important to address it. 

I advocate anarchism (anarcho-communism, RBE, Voluntarism whatever you call it) for being one the fairiest way of producing common wellbeing meanwhile assuring the individuals autonomy. But I'm really concerned about one thing right now.

A horrendous case of social injustice just happened today: A 7 years old girl was kidnapped, tortured, raped and murdered here in Colombia.

http://www.latintimes.com/rafael-uribe-noguera-colombian-man-arrested-alleged-kidnapping-rape-murder-7-year-old-406369

I would like to ask to the people here, what will anarchism do to prevent this happen? maybe education will be the answer, perhaps interconnected public surveillance, mental illness health care?

What do you guys think?

2_133PfjoNP94oHC3GczL9e7SCKoeKEMyCDJ.body: ZeroGo sounds good and it's self-explained.

1_127xneP1vvFJyc6SQZNzh2hyrkBuezpcvr.body: It would be a great add. Nice idea.

1_14gU7BmDVYaUD6b1fks74MQv6XtsCnAgEX.body: Turn down for what!, Nazi Logic XD

1_1Mr36Z4TSbWQ236NfvRPeLn3qsAwngBzMd.body:
You can mute an user though, mute the user you don't want to know about. As I understand the mute feature, you can use it on people you don't want to feed with your attention, so you left them discussing with themselves hehehe.

They don't deserve our attention if they don't want to put some interest on our responses.

1517061325_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
"proxy usa https, quic e ipv6 (sep, nadie usa ipv6, en estos días), basicamente todas las caracteríticas que tiene caddy." - 

This proxy uses https, quic and ipv6 (yep, nobody uses ipv6 these days). Basically, all the features caddy has.

So, it is just a proxy.

1517743836_1HsgZpHaZ5BRUK5qr2YMWnubgKyNu.body:
I do not love the abstract term of country. I do not feel separated from anyone else because of a territory they live at. We share the same planet Earth and what it respects to me, everyone has the right to be everywhere they want.

But, I like my local surroundings, Colombia/Columbia (whatever you like to call it) has a bunch of beautiful landscapes to see and enjoy. People are naturally well intentionated but the lack of a good education system makes us pay a high price by putting us on an absurd fight with each other in a contest for not being a fool, or for being the least of the fools. It is a bad understood intelligence we have here.

We say idioms like: "Don't give Papaya". That means you do not have to put yourself stupidly in a danger position were you can be robbed easily. We tend to punish the victim and not the perpetrator.

I love my family, my friends, my coalegues, the place I live; But I'm aware of the other things that make hard to live here.

1519995278_1PGFKCfMSL1QdudndfYCo4mGM8E8X.body:
Yes, I'm afraid that there is a risk that a smart person would try to abuse of its rationality in order to trick someone else into a forced decision.

So I have:

- There should be a reasonable trust among people.
- There would be a problem if one person blocked the consensus.
- There must be a way to let people with good will to enter and participate on the document.
- A ranking based on how ethical is the behavior of a person.
- If I put a little power on the rationality characteristic, a person might take advantage from it.
- Levels of trust.

I have to point that the consensus system would only be necessary for the document-creation process. The solutions discovered and generated from the project, might have another kind of organization structure depending on the moral principles written previously.

If you find other points of failure, please let me know.

Thanks!

>Project that is easy to troll or break, part 1.

Yes, that was my concern about it. That is why I am asking to you guys for creative ways to fix it. :/

> [krixano](#comment_368_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): Which language? Spanish?

Yes, sorry. It is Spanish.

@krixano I would like to know more exactly, what does merge mean in this context. I tried to translate it to something like Fusionable. I was wondering if it meant to be something like "Mixed zites".

Is "File Sharing" a verb or a noun?
